author: high_byte
content: I don't think zk poex should be used for extortion. it should be used to mediate exploit disclosure to teams in a way that gives them enough time to close the exploit but not giving a working exploit to any party listening to the conversation, all while protecting privacy

author: high_byte
content: that being said, I highly doubt a hacker will try to extort via proof of exploit, they will simply exploit. at least won't be for a while until we see anything like that
